# Quick Disable
## Overview
*Quick Disable (Ex):* It takes a rogue with this ability half the normal amount of time to disable a trap using the [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] skill (minimum 1 round).

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 68
